mapper.sql: ID, CASE_ID, REGISTRACTION_NUM, NAME, ADDRESS, PROXY, REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL, COMPANY_TYPE, REGISTRACTION_TIME, TEL, CREDIT_CODE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CASE_COMPANY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CASE_COMPANY (ID, CASE_ID, REGISTRACTION_NUM, NAME, ADDRESS, PROXY, REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL, COMPANY_TYPE, REGISTRACTION_TIME, TEL, CREDIT_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registractionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registractionCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registractionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into CASE_COMPANY
ID,
CASE_ID,
REGISTRACTION_NUM,
NAME,
ADDRESS,
PROXY,
REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL,
COMPANY_TYPE,
REGISTRACTION_TIME,
TEL,
CREDIT_CODE,
CLUE_INFO_ID,

mapper.update:
update CASE_COMPANY
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRACTION_NUM = #{record.registractionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROXY = #{record.proxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL = #{record.registractionCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANY_TYPE = #{record.companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRACTION_TIME = #{record.registractionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEL = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_CODE = #{record.creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CASE_COMPANY set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRACTION_NUM = #{record.registractionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROXY = #{record.proxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL = #{record.registractionCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANY_TYPE = #{record.companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRACTION_TIME = #{record.registractionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEL = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDIT_CODE = #{record.creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CASE_COMPANY
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRACTION_NUM = #{registractionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROXY = #{proxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL = #{registractionCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANY_TYPE = #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRACTION_TIME = #{registractionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update CASE_COMPANY set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRACTION_NUM = #{registractionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROXY = #{proxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL = #{registractionCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANY_TYPE = #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTRACTION_TIME = #{registractionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.REGISTRACTION_NUM, COUNT(A.REGISTRACTION_NUM)AS CASE_NUM, MIN(A.NAME) AS NAME, MIN(A.PROXY) AS PROXY, MIN(A.REGISTRACTION_TIME) AS REGISTRACTION_TIME, MIN(A.COMPANY_TYPE) AS COMPANY_TYPE, MIN(A.REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL) AS REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL FROM CASE_COMPANY A,
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.INPUTER,C.CASE_NAME FROM CASE_BASIC C, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) B
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.INPUTER,C.CASE_NAME FROM CASE_BASIC C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID,POLICE_TYPE ) SO ON C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID WHERE (SO.POLICE_TYPE = 1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) B
CASE_BASIC B
, USER_ C, ORGANISE D WHERE A.CASE_ID = B.CASE_ID AND B.INPUTER = C.USER_ID AND C.ORG_ID = D.ORG_CODE
AND D.ORG_PATH LIKE CONCAT(#{orgPath,jdbcType=DECIMAL},'%')
AND D.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtCode},'%')
GROUP BY A.REGISTRACTION_NUM

SELECT COUNT(TEMP.REGISTRACTION_NUM) FROM (SELECT A.REGISTRACTION_NUM FROM CASE_COMPANY A,
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.INPUTER,C.CASE_NAME FROM CASE_BASIC C, (SELECT S.CASE_ID FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' AND O.POLICE_TYPE=2 GROUP BY CASE_ID ) SO WHERE C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID) B
(SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.INPUTER,C.CASE_NAME FROM CASE_BASIC C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.CASE_ID,O.POLICE_TYPE FROM CASE_STEP S, ORGANISE O WHERE S.TARGET_ORG_ID = O.ORG_CODE AND S.TARGET_ORG_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CASE_ID,POLICE_TYPE ) SO ON C.CASE_ID=SO.CASE_ID WHERE (SO.POLICE_TYPE = 1 OR SO.POLICE_TYPE IS NULL)) B
CASE_BASIC B
, USER_ C, ORGANISE D WHERE A.CASE_ID = B.CASE_ID AND B.INPUTER = C.USER_ID AND C.ORG_ID = D.ORG_CODE
AND D.ORG_PATH LIKE CONCAT(#{orgPath,jdbcType=DECIMAL},'%')
AND D.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtCode},'%')
GROUP BY A.REGISTRACTION_NUM)TEMP
select distinct case_id from case_company where REGISTRACTION_NUM=#{registractionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT #{districtCode}||ID AS ID,#{districtCode}||CASE_ID AS CASE_ID, REGISTRACTION_NUM, NAME, ADDRESS, PROXY, REGISTRACTION_CAPITAL, COMPANY_TYPE,REGISTRACTION_TIME, TEL FROM CASE_COMPANY WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CASE_MODIFIED_INFO WHERE EXP_STATE = 'N' AND ID = KEY_VALUE AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName})

SELECT C.CASE_ID,C.CASE_NO,C.CASE_NAME,C.INPUT_TIME,C.CASE_STATE,C.INPUT_UNIT,D.ORG_NAME,C.PROC_KEY FROM CASE_BASIC C,CASE_COMPANY CC,USER_ U, ORGANISE D WHERE C.CASE_ID=CC.CASE_ID AND C.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = D.ORG_CODE
AND CC.REGISTRACTION_NUM=#{registractionNum}
AND D.ORG_PATH LIKE CONCAT(#{orgPath}, '%')
AND D.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtCode},'%')
AND INSTR(C.CASE_NO,#{caseNo})> 0
AND INSTR(C.CASE_NAME,#{caseName})> 0

SELECT COUNT(C.CASE_ID) FROM CASE_BASIC C,CASE_COMPANY CC,USER_ U, ORGANISE D WHERE C.CASE_ID=CC.CASE_ID AND C.INPUTER = U.USER_ID AND U.ORG_ID = D.ORG_CODE
AND CC.REGISTRACTION_NUM=#{registractionNum}
AND D.ORG_PATH LIKE CONCAT(#{orgPath}, '%')
AND D.DISTRICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{districtCode},'%')
AND INSTR(C.CASE_NO,#{caseNo})> 0
AND INSTR(C.CASE_NAME,#{caseName})> 0
